Project0

Class RevatureBank

  • java.lang.Object
    • Project0.RevatureBank
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Project0.ConsoleReference, Project0.LogReference

    public class RevatureBank
extends java.lang.Object
implements Project0.ConsoleReference, Project0.LogReference
    RevatureBank encapsulates the logic of the entire bank application.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,Project0.RevatureAccounts.Account> accounts
      accounts contains the list of accounts RevatureBank possesses.
      static RevatureBank entrance
      entrance contains the singleton instance of RevatureBank.
      private java.lang.String STORAGE
      STORAGE contains the location of persistent storage.

      • Fields inherited from interface Project0.ConsoleReference

        console

      • Fields inherited from interface Project0.LogReference

        logger

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      private RevatureBank()
      This constructor reads from persistent storage if it exists.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static boolean accountExists(java.lang.String username)
      accountExists checks if a Username exists.
      private void createAccount()
      createAccount() creates a new UserAccount() and adds it to accounts.
      void enter()
      enter() displays a welcome message to the user.
      void exit()
      exit() leaves RevatureBank after saving account information to persistent storage.
      static java.util.List<java.util.Map.Entry<java.lang.Integer,Project0.RevatureAccounts.Account>> getUnapprovedAccounts()
      getUnapprovedAccounts() filters accounts and collects those that are not approved.
      void printAccounts()
      printAccounts() prints all accounts in accounts.
      private void signIn()
      signIn() handles the logic of user sign in.
      private void welcome()
      welcome() uses user input to decide whether to create a new account or sign into an existing account.

    • Constructor Detail

      • RevatureBank

        private RevatureBank()
        This constructor reads from persistent storage if it exists. If there is no persistent storage, the RevatureBank gets initialized with a single admin account.

    • Method Detail

      • accountExists

        public static boolean accountExists(java.lang.String username)
        accountExists checks if a Username exists.
        Parameters:
        username -
        Returns:
        true if the username exists, false otherwise.

      • createAccount

        private void createAccount()
        createAccount() creates a new UserAccount() and adds it to accounts.

      • signIn

        private void signIn()
        signIn() handles the logic of user sign in.

      • enter

        public void enter()
        enter() displays a welcome message to the user.

      • exit

        public void exit()
        exit() leaves RevatureBank after saving account information to persistent storage.

      • getUnapprovedAccounts

        public static java.util.List<java.util.Map.Entry<java.lang.Integer,Project0.RevatureAccounts.Account>> getUnapprovedAccounts()
        getUnapprovedAccounts() filters accounts and collects those that are not approved.
        Returns:
        a List of accounts that are DENIED and PENDING.

      • printAccounts

        public void printAccounts()
        printAccounts() prints all accounts in accounts.

      • welcome

        private void welcome()
        welcome() uses user input to decide whether to create a new account or sign into an existing account.
